channel.title: This is a Thing
channel.description: Just pointing out stuff I think is cool and talking about it

item.title: Gatsby
item.description: This is gatsby, a react-based framework for making static websites. Seems like a bit of a contradiction, seeing as react is supposed to be…
item.content:encoded: This is gatsby, a react-based framework for making static websites. Seems like a bit of a contradiction, seeing as react is supposed to be all about dynamic websites, but what gatsby offers instead is speed. Everything’s rendered at compile time, and every link on a page is prefetched.

item.title: First!
item.description: When I was at my first job, I’d often see something cool and post a link to slack saying “this is a thing”. I figured that people would see…
item.content:encoded:
When I was at my first job, I’d often see something cool and post a link to slack saying “this is a thing”. I figured that people would see whatever it is and, if it was relevant to them, they’d probably know pretty quickly why I’d pointed it out.

Anyway, that’s what this blog is about. Hopefully you get something out of it.
